# sage-button

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                               | Type                                                                    | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | When set to true, buttons are disabled    | `boolean`                                                               | `undefined` |
| `icon`     | `icon`     | When set to true, icon is added to button | `string`                                                                | `undefined` |
| `variant`  | `variant`  | Button type                               | `"accent" \| "destructive" \| "disclosure" \| "primary" \| "secondary"` | `'primary'` |


----------------------------------------------
